channel.title: Quick botting question
channel.description: Do Jagex ip ban for botting?

item.title: Quick botting question
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:6, topic:340136”]Too many people have dynamic IP’s for them to ip ban.

I haven’t seen any evidence to suggest that they IP ban anyone ever[/quote]

They started to ipban people around 08-09 period for botting.

Ask Dylan, he is ipbanned.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick botting question
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Too many people have dynamic IP’s for them to ip ban.

I haven’t seen any evidence to suggest that they IP ban anyone ever

Read full topic

item.title: Quick botting question
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

[quote=“Natey, post:4, topic:340136”][quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=436512.msg3208526#msg3208526 date=1274026735]

no, but they watch your IP address if you are caught botting o.o

Care to explain? I’ve had around 3 accounts banned total, 2 of which were botting. I have a few accounts left, including a level 132 that has only ever received mutes. If you mean they will ban any other accounts using that IP, that’s wrong. I’m assuming that wasn’t what you meant though.

@Topic: No, don’t worry about it.
[/quote]No, I mean if you are caught botting and it’s obvious you did/are botting, they will watch your ip for any other accounts that me look like they’re botting.[/quote]

Yes, they do. It would be foolish if they didn’t.
Jagex isn’t stupid, and if you are obviously botting of course they are going to ban you.

Read full topic

@Topic: No, don’t worry about it.[/quote]No, I mean if you are caught botting and it’s obvious you did/are botting, they will watch your ip for any other accounts that me look like they’re botting.
